ComicInfo.Summary:
The bloodbath concludes here as the ill-fated Hatchetface Lives movie gets its final cut... literally! Honey Island Swamp is the scene of another massacre and you have a front row seat to the carnage. This is Adam Green's American slasher classic with all new tales of terror! HATCHET #3 comes with three covers - Main Who Axed You Cover by Richard Bonk, Swamp Terror Cover by Buz Hasson, and the Cut in Two Cover by interior splatter artist Andrew Mangum.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Main "Who Axed You?" Cover | Rich Bonk | 1 | B | No Mercy Variant Cover | Buz Hasson | 3 | C | Gore Variant Cover | Andrew Mangum | 4 | D | Limited Edition Photo Cover | Photo | 2 |
